endpoints.ps1 was created for you in folder endpoints. Add your logic to that one.
If you want to add additional pages add them to the pages folder.
If you want to add PowerShell functions to that project add them to the src folder.
The PowerShell module file imports every PowerShell function file and imports them into the UniversalDashboard runspace.
If you want to change the port for example you do that in the dbconfig.json.
If you have assets like pictures add It to the assets folder.
If you use VS Code you can use the task 'Start Dashboard'.
